live_updates: Crews on site have been able to stablize the services. Teams continue to monitor. Thank you for your patience.
Crews have arrived on site and are investigating cause of outages and to complete repairs.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
57558.summary: Some customers in the North-East areas of Calgary (including but not limited to: Rundle, Sunridge, Northeast Calgary, Temple, Falconridge, Martindale, Vista Heights...) are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
57558.title: Feb 3 - Calgary (North-East) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
